Reviews.Title: “FOR EUR 50, IT'S A STEAL!”
Reviews.Author: fatih2011
Reviews.Content: homey 3story hotel central sultanahmet easy walkable access main sights double breakfast eur 50 owner friendly helpful staff situated main touristic street shops restaurants tiny clean bright windows tv bed spotless bathroom overlooking street double glazing windows block 90 noise humdrum below bad sounds reception heard 1st floor breakfast basic nutritious top floor overlooking sultanahmet ayasofya mosques

Reviews.Title: “Value for money and centrally located”
Reviews.Author: Supratim
Reviews.Content: hotel deal location awesome near sultanahmet tram station lane hotels restaurants till late night sultanahmet stay istanbul visit lot nearby location sofia blue mosque topkapi museum spice bazaar grand bazaar etc walking distance walk sea ride boat hotel free internet courteous staff complementary breakfast included average

Reviews.Title: “A brilliant find in Sultanahmet”
Reviews.Author: vandalmax
Reviews.Content: hotel extremely clean quiet dont front larger ratings reflect budget travel prices roaming clean bathrooms location sultanahmet friendly managers free internet patchy reception 2nd floor bad windows breakfast literally finished bread baskets butter cheese didnt expect low price ignore simply eat elsewhere pictures terrace closed terrace probably cause weather plus hotel worth hostels charge similar rates plan spend time roaming istanbul coming sleep breaks brilliant managers friendly look stern look price depending timing

Reviews.Title: “No frills, friendly service, good location”
Reviews.Author: r88my
Reviews.Content: luxury hotel isnt hotel clean necessarily modern maybe slightly overpriced lacks respect makes manager friendly enjoyed stay location leisurely walk major sights sultanahmet main gripe noise bars cafes people outside noise died hear odd people late bring pair ear plugs front otherwise facing rear

HotelInfo.Name: Gul Sultan Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Sultanahmet Akbiyik Caddesi No 9 | Eminonu, Istanbul 34122, Turkey
